page.title: 01 Our Block in West Stafford.
page.content: Our school,Highfield Grove Middle, has been given west Stafford to investigate. Stafford(pop 50,000) is a county town situated in the West Midlands, on the river Sow. Our block is 3Km by 4Km,including the western part of the town,and the adjoining rural areas. The rural area includes one main village called Derrington and one small village north of Derrington called Aston.There are also several hamlets and fifteen farms.Around Derrington the land is used mainly for growing crops and grazing land for animals. In the built up area, including the suburbs,which are Doxey, Western Downs,Castletown and Highfields there are lots of houses, schools,some factories and part of the town.Stafford castle is well worth a visit.
